name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers Quiz / Test | M | 10 Questions

questions.text: What were the rangers doing in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Skydiving.

	After the opening scroll, the first scene with the Rangers in it showed them all jumping out of a small airplane. Bulk and Skull were also on the plane and jumping. All six Rangers landed in the landing zone. Bulk and Skull missed the zone completely and landed in a different area of town.

questions.text: Who was the new villain that replaced Lord Zedd and Rita Repulsa for the movie?
questions.explanation:
Ivan Ooze.

	Ivan was dug up in a construction area and quickly deposed the other evil leaders. He attacked the Command Center and destroyed the Rangers power coins.  He was purple and could shape shift. He had been buried in a giant egg for thousands of years. Zedd and Rita along with their minions were the ones who opened the egg that Ooze was captured inside of, only for him to take over their roles.

questions.text: What planet did the Rangers travel to in order to gain their new powers?
questions.explanation:
Phaedos.

	After Ooze managed to destroy their powers, Alpha 5 and Zordon were able to send them to Phaedos to search of the Ninja Powers.  Along with those powers came new zords and abilities.

questions.text: Which character uttered the line "You ooze, you lose"?
questions.explanation:
Billy.

	Billy, while fighting unmorphed, punched one of Ivan's minions in the chest. Purple ooze covered his fist as the minion was defeated.  Billy they said the line and was attacked by another minion.

questions.text: Who was the first character shown to have morphed?
questions.explanation:
Kimberly.

	Tommy was the first to say the words, "It's Morphin Time" though he was the last of the six rangers to be seen in costume. Kimberly was the first to be seen in her (pink) ranger costume. During the fight with Ooze's minions, he was off destroying the Command Center, and therefore the ranger's powers.

questions.text: Which Ranger had the "Power Beam" on their helmet?
questions.explanation:
Aisha.

	Each Ranger had special features on their helmets, though only Aisha and Rocky got to use them. Aisha had the Power Beam, which was basically a dual flashlight. Rocky had the Power Scope which was basically a nightvision scanner.

questions.text: What was the name of Tommy's sword?
questions.explanation:
Saba.

	Tommy used Saba, and mentioned him by name to finish off Ooze's minions. In the TV series the movie is based on Saba could talk, but in the movie that ability wasn't shown. The sword was able to fly, and used laser beams out of the eyes on the carved hilt.

questions.text: What planet was Zordon originally from?
questions.explanation:
Eltar.

	Zordon's home planet was mentioned several times. Lord Zedd and Ivan Ooze both mentioned that Zordon was from Eltar. When Ooze destroyed the Command Center, the chamber Zordon was inside was also damaged. This caused him to start to age rapidly and appear to be on his death bed. The Rangers managed to save him when they discovered the "Great Power" on Phaedos.

questions.text: What was the name of the warriors that Ivan Ooze sent to chase after the Power Rangers?
questions.explanation:
Tengu.

	The Tengu Warriors were large black bird-like creatures. They were sent to Phaedos to chase down and destroy the Rangers. The creatures could speak English, but spoke in a language similar to birds as well.

questions.text: Who helped the Rangers to find the Great Power on the distant planet?
questions.explanation:
Dulcea.

	Dulcea was the protector of the Great Power on Phaedos. She was at first reticent to help them, and warned that the quest could be deadly. In the end she led them to the power and directed them on how to retrieve it. She was an old friend of Zordon's.
